subject: Re: [junit] Problems running automated tests of TestFirstDesigned GUI
msgSnippet: From: Brian Button  ... You might also be able to do something with VNC (virtual network client) which has a dummy X server on Unix.
messageBody:
From: "Brian Button" <bbutton01@...>
> I'd actually tried connecting to an X session I had started on the
> local machine, and that still gave the same Connection Refused errors,
> even after doing an xhost +. I'll try it again to see if I just left
> something out..

You might also be able to do something with VNC (virtual network client) which has a dummy X server on Unix.

Steve
